ROOT.GetSubStationInfo: select * from (select A.id,A.name,A.type,A.dcc_id,A.top_ac_voltage_type,A.pg_id,A.operate_date,a.region,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.altitude,a.owner ,B.LEVEL AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,a.operate_state from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B A left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.PG_ID = B.ID) tempa {0}
ROOT.GetConverSubStationInfo: select * from (select A.id,A.name,A.type,A.dcc_id,A.dc_voltage_type,A.pg_id,A.operate_date,a.region,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.altitude,a.owner,B.LEVEL AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,a.operate_state from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B A left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.PG_ID = B.ID) tempa {0}
ROOT.GetPlantInfo: select * from (select A.id,A.name,A.plant_type,A.dcc_id,A.max_voltage_type,A.connective_pg_id,A.operate_date,a.region,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.altitude,a.owner,B.LEVEL AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,a.operate_state,a.name_abbreviation from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_PLANT_B A left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID = B.ID) tempa {0}
ROOT.GetHVDCGroundStationInfo: select * from ( select A.id,A.name,3002 AS TYPE,A.dcc_id,2099 as voltage_type,A.dcc_id,A.operate_date,a.region,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.altitude,a.owner,B.LEVEL AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,a.operate_state from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B A left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.DCC_ID = B.ID) tempa {0}
ROOT.GetACLineInfo: select distinct * from (select A.id,A.name,A.grid_id,a.voltage_type,a.length,a.start_st_id,a.end_st_id,a.dispatch_org_id,a.operate_date,a.running_state,a.owner,a.start_tower_id,a.end_tower_id,a.license_org_id,B.LEVEL AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,0 as erectingmethod from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.GRID_ID = B.ID) tempa {0}
ROOT.GetACLineInfoByRange: select L.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B S ON L.START_ST_ID= S.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_PLANT_B P ON L.START_ST_ID = P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B C ON L.START_ST_ID=C.ID left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B SE ON L.END_ST_ID= SE.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_PLANT_B PE ON L.END_ST_ID = PE.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B CE ON L.END_ST_ID=CE.ID {0}
ROOT.LineRangeWhere: (( S.longitude > {0} and S.longitude < {1} and S.latitude >= {2} and S.latitude <= {3}) or(p.longitude > {0} and P.longitude < {1} and P.latitude >= {2} and p.latitude <= {3}) or (C.longitude > {0} and C.longitude < {1} and C.latitude >= {2} and C.latitude <= {3}) or(SE.longitude > {0} and SE.longitude < {1} and SE.latitude >= {2} and SE.latitude <= {3}) or(PE.longitude > {0} and PE.longitude < {1} and PE.latitude >= {2} and PE.latitude <= {3}) or(CE.longitude > {0} and CE.longitude < {1} and CE.latitude >= {2} and CE.latitude <= {3}))
ROOT.GetDCLineInfo: select distinct * from (select A.id,A.name,A.grid_id,a.voltage_type,a.length,a.start_st_id,a.end_st_id,a.dispatch_org_id,a.operate_date,a.running_state,a.owner,a.start_tower_id,a.end_tower_id,a.license_org_id,B.LEVEL AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,0 as erectingmethod from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.GRID_ID = B.ID) tempa {0}
ROOT.GetDCLineInfoByRange: select L.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B L left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B S ON L.START_ST_ID= S.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_PLANT_B P ON L.START_ST_ID = P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B C ON L.START_ST_ID=C.ID left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B SE ON L.END_ST_ID= SE.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_PLANT_B PE ON L.END_ST_ID = PE.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B CE ON L.END_ST_ID=CE.ID {0}
ROOT.GetACLineH1MEA: select same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_2018.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_2018 join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B ON same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_2018.ID= same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B.ID AND same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} {1}
ROOT.GetDCLineH1MEA: select same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_2018.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_2018 join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B ON same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_2018.ID= same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B.ID AND same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} {1}
ROOT.GetACLineH1MEA_TJ: select same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H15_MEA_2018_TJ.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H15_MEA_2018_TJ join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B ON same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H15_MEA_2018_TJ.ID= same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B.ID AND same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} {1}
ROOT.GetDCLineH1MEA_TJ: select same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H15_MEA_2018_TJ.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H15_MEA_2018_TJ join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B ON same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H15_MEA_2018_TJ.ID= same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B.ID AND same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} {1}
ROOT.GetGraphTypeInfo: select distinct g.* from tOutput t left join GraphTypeInfo g on t.GraphTypeID= g.GraphTypeID where graphicid ={0} union select* from GraphTypeInfo where IsSpecial = 1
ROOT.GetLineInfoByID: select tn.* from tOutputNodeInfo tn left join (select graphitemid from tOutput where graphicid={0}) item on tn.graphItemId= item.graphItemId where item.graphItemId is not null
ROOT.GetGraphItemStateByID: select B.groundPos ifgrd, B.haspower, B.state, A.deviceIdx, A.deviceName, C.graphItemId from tDevice A join tState B on A.deviceIdx = B.deviceIdx join ( select graphItemId, G.graphDevId, L.graphicid from ( select * from pdpsgraph..tgraphitem where graphisuse = 1 and graphDevId <> '' ) G join pdpsgraph..layers L on G.graphLayerId = L.id where graphicid = @GraphicID ) C on A.devicename = C.graphdevid
ROOT.GetChaoLiuTest: select chaoliu.DeptName,chaoliu.DeptDesc,chaoliu.GCPOSITION,chaoliu.Trans,chaoliu.TransCount,chaoliu.TransName,chaoliu.HighConnect,chaoliu.LowConnect, chaoliu.TransState,chaoliu.LineState,chaoliu.BusState,a.rectPos,a.graphicid,td.departType from tChaoLiuGC chaoliu join ( select tout.graphItemId ,tout.rectpos, station.departName,station.deptDesc,station.graphicid from tOutput tout join tOutputStation station on station.graphitemid=tout.graphItemId ) A on a.departName = chaoliu.DeptName join tDepartment td on td.deptDesc=chaoliu.DeptDesc
ROOT.GetTDevice: select distinct a.deviceidx,a.devicename,v.voltageDesc from( select * from tDevice where typeIdx =13 union all select * from tDevice where typeIdx =15 union all select * from tDevice where typeIdx =16 union all select * from tDevice where typeIdx =21 union all select * from tDevice where typeIdx =38 ) a left join tVoltage v on a.voltageIdx = v.voltageIdx
ROOT.GetTransformACLineInfo: select distinct A.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B C ON A.END_ST_ID = C.ID where b.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE <> C.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE and (B.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} or C.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE={0}) UNION select A.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B A LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID= B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B C ON A.END_ST_ID=C.ID where A.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} AND (b.ID IS NOT NULL OR C.ID IS NOT NULL)
ROOT.GetTransformDCLineInfo: select distinct A.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B C ON A.END_ST_ID = C.ID where A.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} and (b.ID IS NOT NULL OR C.ID IS NOT NULL) UNION select distinct A.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B A LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID= B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B C ON A.END_ST_ID=C.ID where b.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE <> C.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE AND (B.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} or C.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE={0})
ROOT.GetExtSubStation: select distinct b.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B B ON A.END_ST_ID = B.ID and B.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE != {0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL UNION select distinct b.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID and B.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE != {0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetExtConvertStation: select distinct b.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B B ON A.END_ST_ID = B.ID and B.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE !={0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL UNION select distinct b.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID and B.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE !={0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetExtPlant: select distinct b.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_PLANT_B B ON A.END_ST_ID = B.ID and B.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE != {0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL UNION select distinct b.* from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_PLANT_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID and B.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE != {0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetLineStation: select * from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B WHERE ID IN ( select START_ST_ID as ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B WHERE ID='{0}' union select END_ST_ID as ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B WHERE ID='{0}' UNION SELECT START_ST_ID AS ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B WHERE ID='{0}' UNION SELECT END_ST_ID AS ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B WHERE ID='{0}')
ROOT.GetACLineTowerInfo: select a.tower_id as ID,a.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE,a.owner,a.towername,b.type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_acline_r_tower a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_tower_b b on a.TOWER_ID = b.ID WHERE LINE_ID = '{0}'
ROOT.GetDCLineTowerInfo: select a.tower_id as ID,a.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE,a.owner,a.towername,b.type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_dcline_r_tower a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_tower_b b on a.TOWER_ID = b.ID WHERE LINE_ID = '{0}'
ROOT.GetTowerInfoNew: select b.ID,a.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE,c.NAME AS LineName,a.TowerName,c.VOLTAGE_TYPE AS VOLTAGE,a.owner,b.type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_dcline_r_tower a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_tower_b b on a.TOWER_ID = b.ID left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B C ON A.LINE_ID = C.ID WHERE LINE_ID = '{0}' union select b.ID,a.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE,c.NAME AS LineName,a.TowerName,c.VOLTAGE_TYPE AS VOLTAGE,a.owner,b.type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_acline_r_tower a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_tower_b b on a.TOWER_ID = b.ID left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B C ON A.LINE_ID = C.ID WHERE LINE_ID = '{0}'
ROOT.GetShowVoltage: SELECT code,name FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE where CODE IN ( SELECT TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B UNION select MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_PLANT_B union select DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B union select VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B )
ROOT.GetWeatherInfo: select distinct(b.ID) ,b.NAME,b.LEVEL,d.REGION AS OWNER ,a.MEAS_TYPE ,c.CODE ,d.CENTERCOORDINATE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_H60_WEA_2018 as a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B as b on (b.id = a.id) left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_WEATHER c on ( convert(int,SUBSTRING (a.MEAS_TYPE , 5 , 4))=c.CODE) left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DISTRICT d on (convert(int,SUBSTRING (b.ID , 5 , 6))=d.REGION) where b.LEVEL = {0} and a.CREATE_DATE = '2018-11-30' and c.CODE IS NOT NULL and d.CENTERCOORDINATE IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetLastUpdateTime_old: select max(lasttime) as lasttime from( select max(to_date(SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19))) as lasttime from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b union select max(to_date(SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19))) as lasttime from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b union select max(to_date(SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19))) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation sg_con_substation_b union select max(to_date(SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19))) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation sg_con_conversubstation_b union select max(to_date(SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19))) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation sg_con_plant_b ) tempa
ROOT.GetLastTowerUpdateTime_old: select max(lasttime) as lasttime from ( select max(to_date(SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19))) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_tower_b union all select max(to_date(SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19))) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_acline_r_tower union all select max(to_date(SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19))) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_dcline_r_tower ) a
ROOT.GetLastUpdateTime: select max(lasttime) as lasttime from( select to_date(max(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end)) as lasttime from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b union select to_date(max(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end)) as lasttime from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b union select to_date(max(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end)) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation sg_con_substation_b union select to_date(max(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end)) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation sg_con_conversubstation_b union select to_date(max(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end)) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameStation sg_con_plant_b ) tempa
ROOT.GetLastTowerUpdateTime: select max(lasttime) as lasttime from ( select to_date(max(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end)) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_tower_b union all select to_date(max(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end)) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_acline_r_tower union all select to_date(max(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,19) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end)) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTower sg_dev_dcline_r_tower ) a
ROOT.GetLastTowerUpdateLineIDs: select distinct line_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower where to_date(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,16) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end) > to_date('{0}') union all select distinct line_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower where to_date(case when length(STAMP)==41 and STAMP like '%____-__-__ __:__%' then SUBSTR(STAMP,23,16) else '1980-01-01 00:00:00' end) > to_date('{0}')
ROOT.GetLineTowerDirection: SELECT ID,NEGATION FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName YSH_DEV_LINE_CONNP where NEGATION > 0
ROOT.GetConnnectionLine: SELECT B.ID,B.NAME,B.PG1,B.PG2,R.MEMBER_ID,R.VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B B JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R R ON B.ID=R.CONNECTIONLINE_ID
ROOT.GetACDCConnnectionLine: select distinct * from ( select A.id,A.name,a.voltage_type,c.pg1,c.pg2 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R R ON a.dcsystem_id=R.member_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B C on r.CONNECTIONLINE_ID = c.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.GRID_ID = B.ID where pg1 is not null and pg2 is not null union all select A.id,A.name,a.voltage_type,c.pg1,c.pg2 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R R ON a.id=R.member_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B C on r.CONNECTIONLINE_ID = c.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.GRID_ID = B.ID where pg1 is not null and pg2 is not null ) m {0}
ROOT.GetSubStationInfo_ems: select * from (select A.id,A.name,A.type,A.dcc_id,A.top_ac_voltage_type,A.pg_id,A.operate_date,a.region,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.altitude,a.owner ,B.LEVEL AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,a.operate_state from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameEms YSH_EMS_STATION_B A left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.PG_ID = B.ID) tempa {0}
ROOT.GetLineInfo_ems: select distinct * from (select A.id,A.name,A.grid_id,a.voltage_type,a.length,a.start_st_id,a.end_st_id,a.dispatch_org_id,a.operate_date,a.running_state,a.owner,a.start_tower_id,a.end_tower_id,a.license_org_id,B.LEVEL AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameEms YSH_EMS_LINE_B A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B B ON A.GRID_ID = B.ID) tempa {0}
ROOT.GetTowerInfoByParam_ems: select b.ID,a.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE,a.TowerName,0 AS VOLTAGE,a.LINE_ID AS LINEID,a.OWNER,b.type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameEms ysh_ems_line_r_tower a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameEms ysh_ems_tower_b b on a.TOWER_ID = b.ID {0}
ROOT.GetGridParentInfo: select p.id,p.parent_id as p_1,f.parent_id as p_2 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_pwrgrid_b p left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_pwrgrid_b f on p.parent_id = f.id
ROOT.GetFibersegLineInfo: select distinct * from ( select f.line_id,A.name,a.voltage_type,f.SEG_ID,f.OWNER,f.GROUND_WIRE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_R_FIBERSEG_ACLINE F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B A ON F.line_id=a.id union all select f.line_id,A.name,a.voltage_type,f.SEG_ID,f.OWNER,f.GROUND_WIRE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_R_FIBERSEG_DCLINE F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B A ON F.line_id=a.id ) m {0}
ROOT.GetRelatedStationByLineID: select start_st_id,end_st_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_B where id in ('{0}')
